Articles.Content:
So I recently got KSP and only began to mod it. This is my attempt at recreating a star fighter from the Manga/Anime Moonlight Mile. The design intrigued me the most as it combined a futuristic look with the more conventional style of today's rockets. As I'm not exactly sure what the star fighter was called I decided to name it the SFS-Raven (Space Fighter System).

The fighter has 6x lasers centered beneath the cockpit and 2 4x missile pods on either shoulder. The solar panels and missile pod latches are actuated and can open/close. Thrusters at the front also allow the fighter to slow down or reverse without having to rotated to the periapsis.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
